author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO WEAKENS SOME AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD THROUGH THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...KIKO WEAKENS SOME AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD THROUGH THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.1, -141.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 954 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO WEAKENS SOME AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD THROUGH THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.1, -141.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 954 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
